title: Riot supports do NOT need another 800g buff
body:
Do NOT give them free sightstones, its going to make the meta support cancer again.

You want supports having super early redemptions and lockets so you can never hope to kill anyone on their team again? You want to make assassins trash tier again?

Stop with buffing one of the strongest roles in the game already wtf.

replies.body:
Yeah, but they're losing *both* the former quest and the former active on those items. I'm not saying it won't be strong, but *any* change that takes sightstone out of the game is the right direction, imo. 

This will allow supports to get real items faster and participate in the game in a way that more closely aligns with other positions. That's a good thing overall. 

If it's too strong, all they have to do is reduce the stats on that item to bring them back in line. Ezpz

What do you mean "closer to other roles"?

Why do ppl somehow think support is a weaker role than others?

Support is one of the strongest roles in the game atm, so no, they do NOT need to "catch up" when they are already at the top, thats why this buff is ridiculous.

The balance team is completely out of touch with the game.

I'm not implying that they are weak; I'm just saying that their itemization is not like other champs; right now, they have basically two required items that other classes don't have. 

With these changes, they'll be more like junglers in that they have *one* role-specific item, and it does everything they need it to do for their role (gold gen and vision for supp, rather than sustain and smite for junglers).
Also worth noting that current Sightstone gives 150HP as well, which is 400g worth of stats. The Sightstone active along isn't being valued at 800g at present, rather around 400g.

Wait, old quests are getting deleted too? Quests are my favorite part of supporting :(

Excellent point, good sir. 

It's almost like this is your job or something :P

Didn't they say the stats + costs of the items would be identical to the current support item + sightstone upgrades? I know you can technically stop at a tier 2 support item, but then supports will be even squishier than they already are.

Maybe tanky supports can greed out for that type of build, but I don't have enough bot lane experience to know for sure.
